definition: sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

sentences.english: Establishing the quality standard of total flavone extracted from Wild jujube seed.
sentences.chinese: 确立了酸枣仁总黄酮提取物的质量标准。

sentences.english: The next day, the sea gave both some zizyphus jujube.
sentences.chinese: 第二天，海天给了乐儿几个酸枣。

sentences.english: Physicochemical properties and fatty acid compositions of jujube kernel oil were studied.
sentences.chinese: 对酸枣仁油的理化性质和脂肪酸组成进行了分析。

sentences.english: Sugared wild jujube brings people sound sleep.
sentences.chinese: 酸枣加白糖，安眠大帮忙。

sentences.english: Objective To study the pharmacological effects of the Ziziphus jujube leaf extract on central nervous system.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察酸枣叶提取物对中枢神经系统作用。

sentences.english: The main reason which wild jujube was short under drought was because growing was stopped earlier.
sentences.chinese: 干旱导致的过早停止生长是酸枣植株矮小的主要原因。

sentences.english: It is the first time to find this compound in zizyphus vulgaris var.
sentences.chinese: 这是在酸枣仁中首次发现这个化合物。

sentences.english: Suanzaoren Decoction is a classic clinical decoction, which has powerful curative effects and is widely used till now.
sentences.chinese: 酸枣仁汤为临床常用经典方剂，疗效确切，应用广泛。

sentences.english: Once I was a vender of sour dates, ground-nuts and what not. But that was ages ago.
sentences.chinese: 我也卖过酸枣，落花生什么的，那可是先前的事了。

sentences.english: Through the comparative experiment, the optimum rooting conditions for Sour jujube and Xilüjujube were studied.
sentences.chinese: 通过试验比较，探明了酸枣和西吕枣的最佳生根条件。

sentences.english: It is the first time to find this compound in zizyphus vulgaris var. spinosus.
sentences.chinese: 这是在酸枣仁中首次发现这个化合物。

definition: hawthorn tree (rose family, genus Crataegus)/rose hip (hawthorn fruit)
blue or green jujube/Chinese green date
a variety of orange grown in Guangdong, Sichuan, Taiwan etc
